lines.text: Sugar, do you see those guys over there?
Those guys over there, I think they're following us.
No, no! Don't look! Look at them in the mirror! Those were the same guys in that clothing store!
I dunno, I can't tell what they look like. God, why don't they just come over and talk to us?
Oh God, they look like creeps!
Or cops! Oh, we gotta get outta here!
I *knew* you shouldn't have messed with that necklace!
I know, I know. I don't think they're following us.
I *knew* we should not have been down this alley, we should have stayed on the street where there are people around!
Okay, okay, they're right behind us. I think they're following us. Let's go.
